Text: Heidelberg Township is a township in York County, Pennsylvania, United States.

1:
--------------------
<Text: Heidelberg Township, York County, Pennsylvania:  The township was erected in 1750 and encompassed the land grant known as "Digges' Choice" (a warrant granted to John Digges in 1727 by the province of Maryland, prior to the time the Mason-Dixon line fixed the final boundary between Maryland and Pennsylvania).>
